amendment.description: Amendment reduces the appropriation for Office of the Assistant Secretary for Budget and Programs, Office of the Secretary, Salaries and Expenses, within the Department of Transportation by $1.6 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 111-578 to reduce the Office of the Assistant Secretary for Budget and Programs, Office of the Secretary, Salaries and Expenses, within the Department of Transportation by $1.6 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehner amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
